Interactive Systems !

Here are some interactive systems with web interfaces that you can interact with.

pragmatic program synthesis of animal patterns

From Program Synthesis with Pragmatic Communication. Communicate target pattern to the robots by showing it informative examples. Play with the system here

pragmatic program synthesis of regular expressions

From Generating Pragmatic Examples to Train Neural Program Synthesizers . Use positive and negative examples to communicate a regular expression to a neuro-symbolic program synthesizer. Play with the system here
